import React from "react"; import axios from "axios"; class Register extends React.Component { componentDidMount() { const form = document.getElementById("formpost"); const formData = new FormData(form); formData.append("title", "The frustration with post request"); form.onsubmit = () => axios.post("http://localhost:800/register", formData).then(response => response.data); } render() { return (
E-COMMERCE
Accueil Connexion Inscription

S'inscrire

Mot de passe :
); } } export default Register;
